description: When IIS uses an old .Net Framework it's possible to enumeration folder with the symbol ~. Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Successful IIS Shortname Fuzzing Scan
query: (url.original:*\~1* AND url.original:*a.aspx AND http.request.method:("GET" OR "OPTIONS") AND http.response.status_code:("200" OR "301"))
